TRAINING METHODOLIGES:

We mainly focus to improve the knowledge and skill of the students and for this; we follow several methods which are as follows:

  • We provide Wi-Fi facility in the campus so Students are familiar to work in E-Environment.
  • We provide brief visual notes to Students which help in clarification of the concepts.
  • We also conduct personality development classes, so they can develop personality & able to communicate well with others.
  • We provide special classes for those students who are weak in studies and need to improve their technical part.
  • We also conduct Knowledge Enhancement Quiz (KEQ) for the students which help to increase the interest of the students for winning various prizes and also concept clarity indirectly.
  • We have ISO 9001:2008 Certification for quality assurance

Besides this, feedback forms are taken from all the students so that we know the status of the faculties. At any point, if we get negative feedback then resolve it positively within a short time.

We also conduct various seminars, Workshops as well as internship programme for the students and sometimes, they hire our students as per their company policies and student knowledge. We have trained approx 200 in SDI Scheme in Last year and More than 2500 students in last two and half years under MSME scheme.

TRAINING RECRUITMENT POLICIES:

Our recruitment policies are fair in nature, as we have a Panel of 4 members which ensures that the recruitment process is designed in such way that every applicant is treated equally with dignity and respect and the selection process is transparent, task oriented and merit based. All the Recruitment process is done through open advertisement only.

Trainers/Teachers are hired initially on the probation for one year. Contract is renewed every year on the basis of individual’s performance.

We also ensure to protect the privacy of the candidate and to preserve the integrity of the recruiting process and confidentiality is maintained throughout and after the conclusion of the recruitment process.
